comment: Tom didn't have time to put together a complete list of suggestions and only reported the result of the votes for the first winner. Therefore, it is not known which sketches Tom chose and which were voted on. A seventh sketch will be selected and drawn outside of the stream.

data.suggestion: White Tigress Adelaide
Trace and Flora out shopping for stuff they are gonna need for the baby and they run into Maren and Sythe: A coincidence or a secret revealed?
Adira handing out candy to the local kids on howloween

Rose teaching a course on proper female wolf etiquette. With Raine only interested from an etymological stand point, wolf Maren embarrassed (but secretly wants to learn for Sythe), and Natani wondering why the hell HE's there.
Monster AU: Vampire Kat encounters Werewolf Raine, and both try to scare off their natural enemy, despite being secretly terrified of each other.
Witch Kat is teaching her newest pupil potion making, Maeve, who mixes up some of the ingredients.
Mike meets a very friendly female skunk Keidran while on an Autumn nature walk and isn't exactly sure how to feel.
Flora helps tiger trace with his cat allergy
Magic 101, as taught by Professor Raine.
Cat Nora being a typical cat. She begs Trace for food, but once he fills up her bowl, she walks away from it. She then paws at the door to go outside, but just sits there once opened.
Nora turns Erilas into a man, and then he asks Very Vixen Mike out on a date.
Maddie and Karen exploring Trace’s estate like a horror movie, found footage kind, being stalked by Rose
Flora trying to eat Trace’s pretzel
Clovis and Natani have a western shoot out at high noon.
Drowsy Raine sits down at the table and smooches Zen-- except that sounds like his laugh coming from by the counter, and his hair seems longer now...
w0lf's Ember in the Night of the living pants
Sequel to Body Swap - Raine and Kat and Measuring Up. Kat is glad that now she can measure her body better than from the first person.
Adelaide and Madelyn as Kratos and Atreus from God of War
Templar Laura AU: Keith returns home, at the head of a Templar fleet sent to siege the Isles
Keith awakening as a Guardian from Destiny with Laura as his Ghost.
(modern world) The main cast as kids dressing up for trick or treating!
Cerberus Natani, three heads are Natani's three aspects, Fem Natani, Male Natani, and Youngtani.
WereSnep Flora turns Nat and Keith into WereSnep's spreading the curse further!
Clovis uses the necronomicon to summon an eldritch horror.
Foxturtle. Laura wearing an oversized potato sack that she can retract into when things get too stressful.
Witch Laura and Kathrin making a potion to turn Trace back to normal (he got turned into his white tiger form by a spell backfire).
Reni (dragon) wearing a sun dress and frolicking in a meadow.
Vampire queen Raine (wolf)
The two characters from Basitin First Time laying in a messed up bed with embarrassed/surprised expressions saying "Wow. . " in unison.
Nora turning three other Twokinds cast members into kittens and re-enacting the Aristocats
Afterlife Brutus greeting a newly dead Clovis excited and happy to see him, Clovis crying because he knows he doesn't deserve it
While Raine and Maren were on hot springs Sythe and Zen stole their clothes and they were left completely naked.
Flora and Kat, in the middle of cat fighting over an argument.
Laura attempting to be a properly scary ghost for Halloween
Raine using her half kind form as her Halloween "costume".
A magical mishap transforms young Rose into a Were-Dragon!
Trace trying to explain to Flora that Mekkan is flat. Flora… doesn’t believe him at all.
Minecraft Skyblock. Keith asks Natani an important question: "Natani, what happened to the cobblestone generator?"
Laura Voorhees stalks Keith

Brutus and Clovis AU, sequel to Queen of Greed. Clovis embracing her curse allowed her ego to step aside and confess her feelings to Brutus. She wants to groom him into a more frightening and intimidating leader than she was as a man.
Trace and Flora going through some cute couple's costume ideas, trying to decide what to go as.
Mike, Evals, and Kat relax at the Gender Swap Spa, where patrons' bodies change upon entry.
Natani dressed as a call of duty hellhound
Rose captured in a dungeon, after being betrayed by Euchre in Chapter 16
The four basitin generals posing for a boy band album
Keith wearing Char Aznable's outfit from Gundam.
Costume party at Riftwall Tavern West; featuring Amelia, Windstraw, Magpie, and Willow
Pirate Queen Jenny kidnaps Natani to try and get ‘him’ to switch allegiances, only to have her breast bindings fail. Maybe have Jenny still interested in Natani, just in a different way.
Day of the dead offering of dead characters: Laura, Alaric, Saria etc. Living characters are there mourning their loved ones but still happy to remember them.
Trace, Flora and Keith find a giant "T" made of Stone in Forest.
Young Alaric, Keith, and Vehra go trick-or-treating. With Alaric it's mostly tricks!
Succubus Maren gives her victim Sythe the choice of what to play with him, Trick or Treat
Trace and Nora playing as the characters in “The Raven”
Flora, Kat, and Therie dressed as the hex girls
Good Morning Cassidy
Gangster AU cat clan crime syndicate speakeasy
Eating Witch Kats pie turns mike back into VV Mike for Halloween
Kat gives a reassuring hug to someone having a bad day
Expectation vs Reality angry Kat
Necromancer Trace: ivory skin, cold black eyes, dark scars; raising the undead, commanding them...to protect the citizens. What? He's a Necromancer not evil
Metroid Zero Suit Tigress Trace
Keith posing for Natani in traditional Basitin lingerie: lacy paw coverings, and nothing else
Natani and Zen try to summon a demon for Halloween, but they mess up and instead summon Mrs. Nibbly
Good Morning Human Reni
A small group of Basitin boys use a Ouija board to contact the deceased buff general for workout advice
After Kat's spot-remover incident, Adira puts on some black lipstick to "re-paint" Kat's roselets.
Trace trying to hide his identity and fails because of lack of creativity
Mimi the Picarto mascot watches the Twokinds stream while eating pretzels.
Natani teases Keith with bare paws
Twokinds meets Calvin and Hobbes! Trace ducks down to talk to a fascinated Calvin, while above them, Flora and Hobbes collide mid-air after they tried to pounce on their respective humans...Ouch!
Dark Trace is attacking a keidran village, the ghost of Saria is standing behind him, begging him to stop.
(Deltarune chapter 2 meme) Kris and Susie fall into the Twokinds world and Susie shouts at Kris saying "God dammit Kris, Where the hell are we?". While they get greeted Trace and Flora
Wolf Maren cuddling Sythe in bed, she tells him it’s purely instinct though she refuses to let go of him
Kathrin getting a foot massage
It's Saria's turn to model for Rose's painting - in her lioness form
younger Adira and Amelia in disguise asking for candy. (ideas for disguise. one dressed as a dragon and the other as a barmaid.)
Trace teaches Flora some magic, but she somehow raises an army of the dead!
Modern Maeve: Maeve spies a shy Basitin exchange student eating by herself in the cafeteria, and decides to join her for lunch.
Vampire blood drive follow-up: Kat seductively leans over a (still) tied-up, scaroused Eric. "Your turn, darling."
Natani driving a motorcycle with Keith
Trace finds some of his old clothes in the manor and dresses up as his old Templar self for Halloween and everybody starts freaking out.
Old west gun slinger Natani. (With damsel Keith!)
Happy HaWwllaween! All canine cadrien howling together on Halloween night!
Adira needs some help around the tavern, so she recruits Mike and Evals for the job. She mentioned the position was for barmaids, right? Oh well, at least the new girls get to keep their tips.
Reni also wants to try fusion magic and asks for vv-Mike's help
Red has to apologize to the Chimera. He has to invite her to buy clothes with the girls
Kathrin as an anthropomorphized Bat, happy Halloween!
Laura on a cruise ship, looking over the railing and basking in the sun.
Keith and Trace in an epic thumb fight, with Flora and Natani cheering them on.
Modern Kat and Zen spending some romantic time together at their apartment.
Eric as a Zapp Brannigan-esque starship captain with Kat as his exasperated first officer.
Were-Keith-wolf: Natani gives Keith a playful nibble on the ear, unintentionally cursing him to turn into a wolf keidran under the full moon.
A super-hyper costumed Maeve after Landen gives her coffee for trick-or-treating.
Sythe and Nibbly as Doomguy and his pet rabbit Daisy (alive)
Adelaide meeting her match in and arm wrestling contest against a muscular female spotted hyena.
Demon tiger Trace 3: Trace comes to his senses, and is filled with tearful remorse after realizing he attacked his (unscathed) love, Flora, who gladly comforts him as she strokes his head in her lap.
Body swap of Flora and Eric...Turning the tables (Eric as Flora being painted in suggestive stance by now Flora as Eric)
The Were-Snep curse returns: Keith and Natani discover Flora and Trace's condition was still contagious.
Vampire Kathrin enjoys wine in the wine cellar in her castle.
Zen and human Raine wrapped up in a blanket, sitting on a couch watching a scary movie. Raine finding out that the movie she picked might be a little too scary for poor Zen.
There's an unspecified emergency and Reni must alert Keiren, but Keiren just got out of the shower. Reni is embarrassed and forgets why she came.
Zen Daki
Willow going trick or treating dressed as a vampire

Maren and Sythe furtively try to find out each other’s preferences, and turn to their ex’s, Flora and Trace, respectively. Unfortunately, as it turned out, the latter have very distant ideas about what their ex’s really like.
Vampire Natani and vampire-hunter Keith
A Remake of Page 352 Scene Remake. Natani accidentally walks in on Keith while he's drying himself off and has a nosebleed.

Sequel to Wolf Mary: young Mary Silverlock uses her Keidran transformation to infiltrate a Snow Wolf village, and meets a young Euchre and Roselyn. They greet and welcome her to their home, which she accepts, though is embarrassed that they're in the fur... like her.
Fertility wish continued: Natani makes fun of Zen for getting Kat pregnant until Kat asks when Natani and Keith will start having kids
Clovis is returns to being male but is forced to wear a girl clothing.
Roselyn, Raine, Cat Nora and Kathrin as Lady Dimitrescu and her daughters from Resident Evil Village for Halloween
A bust size chart assembled by Natani to appear smaller in the chest region. (similar to how Flora did it, but for the opposite effect.)
Reni taking the Chimaera trick-or-treating, being so very, adorkably excited--until Kei spots her and she's all embarrassed.
Sam and Collin out for walkies. Enjoying a fall stroll in a park walking through the leaves.
